ai-patthana2.6-7:0.2_0: The one beyond the things that are hard to restrain,
ai-patthana2.6-7:2.1_0: The cause and condition that gives rise to the teaching ...
ai-patthana2.6-7:2.1_1: (There were) white coverings, shaft, etc., covering the rod.
ai-patthana2.6-7:3.1_0: The additional permutation series is finished.
